3. Basic fire prevention checklist (turn off the lights, turn off the fans,
Check the body by attaching computer and TV power drawers, etc

4. Fire extinguishers shall be kept at least one in the classroom and at least one in the hallway every 20m, and the supplement condition shall be kept every six months
